channel.title: How Do You Add Commands?

item.title: How Do You Add Commands?
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

to change the player rights, go to your source, click on character and on te character you want, where it says ~character rights~ change it to whatever…1=mod, 2=admin, 3-4=owner/co-owner

item.title: How Do You Add Commands?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

open client.java search for “master” if u dont find that search for “notedbarrows” or “barrows” and add this under it

if (command.startsWith(“COMMANDNAME”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
addItem(ITEMID,HOWMANY);
}

THE COMMAND NAME WILL BE WHEN U TYPE ::COMMANDNAME

AND THE PLAYERRIGHTS ARE AS FOLLOWS

1- MOD ONLY MODS/ADMINS/OWNERS CAN USE
2 - ADMIN/OWNER ONLY
3 - OWNER ONLY

hope this helped

Read full topic
